channel.title: Getting Server online for frends
channel.description:
Hi all , Thanks To Medizine i got all the items added ,added and i know how to now , but i jus need to get my server online for frends now. so they can see how good/bad it is and jus wondering if any1 could show/tell me how to do this..
Cheers Sphiinx

item.title: Getting Server online for frends
item.dc:creator: @Axiom_Owner Axiom Owner
item.description:
@Axiom_Owner wrote:

Well did you make a No-Ip account if not go here… http://www.no-ip.com/
Did you Port you router if no go here… http://portforward.com/ follow the instructions…
Then change the ip on you server to the ip you got from no-ip.com, then you should be set…just run server then run your client…

Read full topic
